data.actual_result: Discord sits for a second then crashes. When reopened, your theme is switched.
data.expected_result: Theme smoothly changes from dark to light/light to dark
data.short_description: Discord crashes after switching themes too fast
data.steps_to_repro: - Enter your settings - change your theme from dark to light or light to dark (depending on whatever you had it on first) - quickly exit settings and return to whatever server chat you were previously on
